name: Teamhuddle
description: Teamhuddle is a community based solution geared to bring the world of athletics closer together. How do we stay physically active in this busy world? Everybody wants to play a sport with a familiar face in a community they trust, so this social initiative allows you to find the players you love playing with, and the sports you love to play. It's that simple.

name: Spareplayers
description: An industry project that was overlooked by Darryl Barr . SparePlayers is a web app that connects teams with spare players that are searching for a game to play. Created with C#, Asp.NET and managed by SQLServer Management Studio.

name: Care-app
description: Project was overlooked by Tejinder Randhawa. Care-App is a cross-platform app that connected nurses with their daily schedule and task so getting to their hospital patients is more convenient.

name: Trends4Friends
description: A Web development project that was done to complete COMP 1536 at BCIT. The main objective for the project was to see how people react in working on a team and how well they work together. The most he got out of this was how to organize a working schedule and communicating with the teammates so the code can be implemented smoothly. My responsibilities was the task of a junior web developer.

name: Bus Whisperer
description: An Android app that allows the user to find out when the bus is coming. Each bus stop in the city of Vancouver comes with a bus stop number. This app allows the user to organize all those bus stops  and retrieve those times without using any DATA. Cool right ?

name: Amsterdam
description: A web development project that targeted tourist that are interested in going to Amsterdam. Technologies that were used are HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap3, CodeIgniter Framework, MySQL. This project excersized techniques to optimize a web page using the CodeIgniter framework.

name: The Face Studio
description: A company run Tuyen Nguyen who specializes in cosmetic tattoos and revisions. This ia prime example of a MEAN stack.
